short_summary: vehicles to the Polar Continental Shelf Program in Ottawa, Ontario
description: The applicant has been designated as a supplier and has the requirement for the supply and delivery of 250 vehicles to the Polar Continental Shelf Program in Ottawa, Ontario. Mention that they require vehicles for daily operations at the Canadian High Artic Research Station (CHARS) campus in Cambridge Bay, Nunavut. Language of the bid is English and French.
